entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
